mapper.select: select rei.id, rei.code, rei.title, rei.device_id, rei.content, rei.repair_start_date, rei.repair_end_date, rei.status, rei.staff_id, rei.create_date, di.name, di.content, di.model, di.brand, si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages, si.phone as staffPhone from repair_record_info rei left join device_info di on (di.id = rei.device_id) left join staff_info si on (si.id = rei.staff_id) where 1 = 1 order by rei.create_date desc
